author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-1232: added getter/setter for setting the FST TreadPool size. The size is now initialised with the default (4)

author: brock
msg: HIVE-5641 - BeeLineOpts ignores Throwable (Brock Noland reviewed by Prasad and Thejas)

author: aconway
msg: QPID-5398: Fix cut 'n paste error in sys/posix/Path.cpp
Posix Path::IsAbsolute() function was checking for windows-style paths.

author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-5357: Upgrade StandardTokenizer and UAX29URLEmailTokenizer to Unicode 6.3; update UAX29URLEmailTokenizer's recognized top level domains in URLs and Emails from the IANA Root Zone Database.

author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-1200: if the SesameRepository is parsed in the constructor it is no longer shutdown in close; The IndexerImpl now calls close on all indexing components
